title: MG Motor looking at rationalising trims, prices to boost volumes, says CEO Chaba
description: “The idea is not to reduce prices but rather to pack features and offer vehicles at price points which will enhance the value proposition of our customers,” Rajeev Chaba, CEO emeritus of MG Motor India, told ET at the Bharat Mobility Show on Friday.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
